inclusion.criterion: 2016 ESC Guidelines for the diagnosis and treatment of acute and chronic heart failure
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Apparently normal healthy volunteers were initially approached
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients with regional wall motion abnormality in 2D echocardiography
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Patients with moderate to severe valvular heart diseases
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has multifactorial chronic hypoxemia and dyspnea thought due to diastolic CHF, pulmonary hypertension thought secondary to a chronic ASD and COPD on 5L home oxygen. Cardiology consult recommended a right heart cath for evaluation of response to sildenafil but the patient refused.
